stix:STIX_Header.stix:Title: Technology Website Redirecting to Malicious Domain
stix:STIX_Header.stix:Description: On 5 August 2014, a report was provided indicating that a technology partner was observed redirecting web traffic to a malicious domain, js.webmailgoogle.com. This redirect downloads a keylogger script.

stix:Indicator.indicator:Description: This was reported as the URL that requests the overall malicious code.

The redirection code first executes the call to download the keylogger script. The code receives keystrokes made by the browser as long as the target website window is active. These are obfuscated using a simple cipher and sent in this URL through HTTP GET requests.

The malicious script contains a misspelled function that is used to search for the presence of McAfee Enterprise using the known Microsoft Internet Explorer \'MSXML\' error files enumeration weakness. The code used to execute this weakness was found on a Chinese language vulnerability database website, though this too has been copied from elsewhere.The Seach() function uses a logic step to check if the visitor is running IE on Windows, and is not running McAfee Enterprise. If so this URL is loaded.

This URL receives the system information which is sent via a HTTP POST request to the server. This check is executed from function within the code names OS(). The two possibilities returned are "WinXP" or "Win7".
This script is akin to a keep-alive beacon which is sent to the attacker so they know when a visitor is active on the targeted website.
This URL receives a list of plugins which are installed in the browser.

The registration administrator email address of ntuaedu@hotmail.com, similar to the registrant address of networkedu[at]hotmail.com.The following is the WHOIS registration information for the domain.Domain Name: webmailgoogle[.]comRegistry Domain ID: 1865338902_DOMAIN_COM-VRSNRegistrar WHOIS Server: whois.godaddy.comRegistrar URL: http://www.godaddy.comUpdate Date: 2014-07-03 05:20:30Creation Date: 2014-07-03 05:20:30Registrar Registration Expiration Date: 2016-07-03 05:20:30Registrar: GoDaddy.com, LLCRegistrar IANA ID: 146Registrar Abuse Contact Email: abuse@godaddy.comRegistrar Abuse Contact Phone: +1.480-624-2505Domain Status: clientTransferProhibitedDomain Status: clientUpdateProhibitedDomain Status: clientRenewProhibitedDomain Status: clientDeleteProhibitedRegistry Registrant ID:Registrant Name: Guo TaiRegistrant Organization:Registrant Street: New York sinsinati 22028 1Registrant Street: New York sinsinati 122028Registrant City: TaipeiRegistrant State/Province: TaipeiRegistrant Postal Code: 100Registrant Country: ChinaRegistrant Phone: +86.22722218Registrant Phone Ext:Registrant Fax:Registrant Fax Ext:Registrant Email: networkedu@hotmail.comRegistry Admin ID:Admin Name: Guo TaiAdmin Organization:Admin Street: New York sinsinati 22028 1Admin Street: New York sinsinati 122028Admin City: TaipeiAdmin State/Province: TaipeiAdmin Postal Code: 100Admin Country: ChinaAdmin Phone: +86.22722218Admin Phone Ext:Admin Fax:Admin Fax Ext:Admin Email: ntuaedu@hotmail.comRegistry Tech ID:Tech Name: Guo TaiTech Organization:Tech Street: New York sinsinati 22028 1Tech Street: New York sinsinati 122028Tech City: TaipeiTech State/Province: TaipeiTech Postal Code: 100Tech Country: ChinaTech Phone: +86.22722218Tech Phone Ext:Tech Fax:Tech Fax Ext:Tech Email: ntuaedu@hotmail.comName Server: NS45.DOMAINCONTROL.COMName Server: NS46.DOMAINCONTROL.COM
